bloc-photo.info: Please don't hesitate to send comments and suggestions in order to improve this website.

me.paragraphe1: Hello, my name is Samuel Mandeng. I am a web developer and more generally a computer enthusiast.
me.paragraphe2: Realizing this site is a way for me to be an actor in the fight against covid-19.Considering the number of hundreds of thousands and now millions of people who are affected by this disease, I proposed to realize this site for with two main objectives:
me.reason1: to remind everyone that covid19 is real and that it does not only affect others
me.reason2: allowing everyone to easily access data about the evolution of covid19 around the world

sources.paragraphe1: To create this website, I had to arm myself with a lot of will, encouragement, advice and reliable data resources. So I give a special thanks to :
sources.source1: disease.sh : an open API for disease-related statistics. They collect and verify data from Worldometers, Johns Hopkins University, government reported data, ..., and keep them up to date
sources.source2: friends & familly: they have been a great help, mainly on encouragement and perseverance
